title:
Frequency dependence of nonsequential double ionization of atoms in
  strong laser fields
authors: Jan H. Thiede, and Jakub S. Prauzner-Bechcicki
abstract:
The frequency dependence of (nonsequential) double ionization is studied in
fully quantum mechanical calculations using a (1+1)-dimensional model atom.
Other time-dependent effects such as the influence of the number of field
cycles are also investigated. We present ionization yields and momentum
distributions. The results are consistent with experimental and semi-classical
data available in the literature, thus complementing them with a quantum
mechanical description.
